pageSetting.title: 卡业绩明细

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select jxdxdh,kh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,zh, (case when kl.dmms is not null then kl.dmms else k.kl end) kl, fkrq,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,qsrq,jsrq,zlbl from (select kzl.jxdxdh,kzl.kh,kzl.jgdh,kzl.zh,kzl.kl,kzl.fkrq,gx.khdxdh,gx.qsrq,gx.jsrq,gx.zlbl from jxdx_kzl kzl inner join dxgx_kyjgx gx on kzl.jxdxdh=gx.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between gx.qsrq and gx.jsrq where kzl.gxhslx='1' and gx.khdxdh in($khdxdh$) union all select kzl.jxdxdh,kzl.kh,kzl.jgdh,kzl.zh,kzl.kl,kzl.fkrq,kzl.khdxdh,kzl.fkrq qsrq,29991231 jsrq,100 zlbl from jxdx_kzl kzl where kzl.gxhslx='0' and kzl.khdxdh in($khdxdh$)) k inner join khdx_jg jg on k.jgdh=jg.jgdh inner join khdx_hy hy on k.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh left join csb_dmms kl on k.kl=kl.dmz and kl.dmmc='KL' inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QXHY($tjrq$, $login_khdxdh$, 0)) hyqx on k.khdxdh = hyqx.khdxdh order by qsrq

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select jxdxdh,kh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,zh, (case when kl.dmms is not null then kl.dmms else k.kl end) kl, fkrq,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,qsrq,jsrq,zlbl from (select kzl.jxdxdh,kzl.kh,kzl.jgdh,kzl.zh,kzl.kl,kzl.fkrq,gx.khdxdh,gx.qsrq,gx.jsrq,gx.zlbl from jxdx_kzl kzl inner join dxgx_kyjgx gx on kzl.jxdxdh=gx.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between gx.qsrq and gx.jsrq where kzl.gxhslx='1' and gx.khdxdh in($khdxdh$) union all select kzl.jxdxdh,kzl.kh,kzl.jgdh,kzl.zh,kzl.kl,kzl.fkrq,kzl.khdxdh,kzl.fkrq qsrq,29991231 jsrq,100 zlbl from jxdx_kzl kzl where kzl.gxhslx='0' and kzl.khdxdh in($khdxdh$)) k inner join khdx_jg jg on k.jgdh=jg.jgdh inner join khdx_hy hy on k.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh left join csb_dmms kl on k.kl=kl.dmz and kl.dmmc='KL' inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QXHY($tjrq$, $login_khdxdh$, 0)) hyqx on k.khdxdh = hyqx.khdxdh order by qsrq ) t
